sentences.en: A phones volume, which changes the volume send to your headphone.

sentences.en: Because of the unique form's guidance, no more messing up with headphone cable.
sentences.cn: 在独特外型的引导下, 耳机线再也不会乱成一团.

sentences.en: Can select headphone output mode to avoid disturbing.
sentences.cn: 可选择耳机输出模式,免打扰听音.

sentences.en: Can you help me with this earphone ( headset headphone )? I can't hear anything.
sentences.cn: 你能帮我看看这个耳机 吗 ?我什么也听不见.

sentences.en: Cons: As with all other bundled headphone, I strongly suggest you get an aftermarket one.
sentences.cn: 缺点: 象其它标配的耳机一样(质量一般), 我强烈建议你重配其它更好的耳机.

sentences.en: Don't know headphone is the best one for using ipod.
sentences.cn: 我用这套算是随身听究级完美了.

sentences.en: Each headphone driver is made to Grado's high standards, then pair - matched for exact imaging.
sentences.cn: 每个耳机驱动器是为歌德的高标准, 然后配对的准确成像.

sentences.en: Length of the headphone cable are free to control.
sentences.cn: 耳机线的长度可以随意控制.

sentences.en: Now the S 66 E the original stereo headphone socket to socket, circuIt'schematics unchanged, infantry line adjustments.
sentences.cn: 现在的S66E将原来的插座改为立体声耳机插座, 电路原理图未变, 步线有所调整.

sentences.en: Removal of the headphone jack is easy.
sentences.cn: 去除的耳机插孔是容易的.

sentences.en: Slight increase in speaker and headphone volume.
sentences.cn: 耳机与扬声器音量稍微有所提升.

sentences.en: Sound headphone also requires a quality amplifier just like a top - grade loudspeaker.
sentences.cn: 靓声的耳机就如同高级的喇叭,同样需要高素质的放大器来伺候.

sentences.en: The headphone cord functions as the FM antenna.
sentences.cn: 耳机导线也具有FM天线的功能.

sentences.en: We are Chinese professional manufacturer for many kinds of headset, earphone, headphone.
sentences.cn: 我们专业生产各种耳机,耳塞, 麦克风, 喇叭,如有需要请联系.
